original_text: It was cold, and the servants and officials stood around a fire they had made to keep warm. Peter also was standing with them, warming himself.
korean_text: 그 때가 추운 고로 종과 아랫사람들이 불을 피우고 서서 쬐니 베드로도 함께 서서 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: and the servants and officials stood around a fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 종들과 관리들은 불 주위에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: they had made to keep warm
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 몸을 따뜻하게 하기 위해 만든 불이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Peter also was standing with them
